resources.string: This is another activity sarting by main activity

Welcome to the Un-official Chuck quiz - just how much of a nerd are you? This quiz is based on season 1 and 2 of the television series "Chuck". If this is the first time playing you should go to the "Settings" option to decide which difficulty setting you think you can master.. will you be good enough to take one the one they call Casey? or will you be left doing "the Morgan".
